channel.title: CVE Feed for BoostifyThemes -- Goto
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BoostifyThemes -- Goto

item.title: CVE-2021-24314|2024-08-03T19:28:23.496Z -- boostifythemes -- goto
item.description: The Goto WordPress theme before 2.1 did not sanitise, validate of escape the keywords GET parameter from its listing page before using it in a SQL statement, leading to an Unauthenticated SQL injection issue
